result.eng: The first place I went to when I moved to Berlin was the city centre.
result.ga: An chéad áit a ndeachaigh mé nuair a bhog mé go Beirlín ná lár na cathrach
result.orig: An chéad áit a ndeachaigh mé nuair a bhog mé go Beirlín ná lár na cathrach
result.html: An chéad áit a ndeachaigh mé nuair a bhog mé go Beirlín ná lár na cathrachThe first place I went to when I moved to Berlin was the city centre.
result.ponchtml: An ċéad áit a ndeaċaiġ mé nuair a ḃog mé go Beirlín ná lár na caṫraċThe first place I went to when I moved to Berlin was the city centre.
